settings.heading: The heart of harmony, Melody that echoes through the earth

settings.label: Message from the President
settings.title: Bridging Tradition and the World
settings.body: For generations, Japan's master artisans have poured their souls into creating works of extraordinary beauty. At Kameya Japan Tradition, we believe these treasures deserve a global stage — one that honors their heritage while connecting them with discerning collectors worldwide.

settings.quote: True craftsmanship transcends borders. It speaks a universal language of beauty, patience, and devotion.

settings.label: Rare Materials
settings.title: Jindai Zelkova — Wood from the Ancient Past
settings.body: Buried beneath the earth for thousands of years, Jindai Zelkova (神代欅) emerges with a color and grain that cannot be replicated. This prehistoric timber, excavated from river beds and volcanic deposits, carries the weight of millennia — making each piece carved from it a bridge between the ancient world and the present.

settings.artist_brief: A master of Arita ware white porcelain, renowned for his luminous vessels that embody purity and grace.
A Living National Treasure in woodturning, whose works celebrate the natural beauty of Japanese timber.
A bold contemporary ceramicist whose sculptural forms push the boundaries of traditional Japanese pottery.
